thread.title: Black Panther smashes box office, Hollywood norms

title: Black Panther smashes box office, Hollywood norms
text:
Black Panther smashes box office, Hollywood norms 8:38pm GMT - 02:12 
Black Panther's record-setting opening weekend is being welcomed from Hollywood to Africa's Nollywood for its portrayal of Africans and African-Americans in the first blockbuster featuring a black superhero and an almost entirely black cast. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Black Panther's record-setting opening weekend is being welcomed from Hollywood to Africa's Nollywood for its portrayal of Africans and African-Americans in the first blockbuster featuring a black superhero and an almost entirely black cast.
